briefdescription.para: returns the initial value of the state variable

detaileddescription.para: applies a change to the asset value. By default, it returns $ x + \Delta x $.

memberdef.argsstring: (Time t0, Real x0, Time dt) const override
memberdef.name: expectation

simplesect.para: in general raises a "not implemented" exception. It should be rewritten to return the expectation E(S) of the process, not exp(E(log S)).

memberdef.argsstring: (Time t0, Real x0, Time dt) const override
memberdef.name: stdDeviation

detaileddescription.para: returns the standard deviation $ S(x_{t_0 + \Delta t} | x_{t_0} = x_0) $ of the process after a time interval $ \Delta t $ according to the given discretization. This method can be overridden in derived classes which want to hard-code a particular discretization.

memberdef.argsstring: (Time t0, Real x0, Time dt) const override
memberdef.name: variance

detaileddescription.para: returns the variance $ V(x_{t_0 + \Delta t} | x_{t_0} = x_0) $ of the process after a time interval $ \Delta t $ according to the given discretization. This method can be overridden in derived classes which want to hard-code a particular discretization.

memberdef.argsstring: (Time t0, Real x0, Time dt, Real dw) const override
memberdef.name: evolve

detaileddescription.para: returns the asset value after a time interval $ \Delta t $ according to the given discretization. By default, it returns \[ E(x_0,t_0,\Delta t) + S(x_0,t_0,\Delta t) \cdot \Delta w \] where $ E $ is the expectation and $ S $ the standard deviation.
returns the time value corresponding to the given date in the reference system of the stochastic process.

simplesect.para: As a number of processes might not need this functionality, a default implementation is given which raises an exception.

detaileddescription.para: This method must be implemented in derived classes. An instance of Observer does not call this method directly: instead, it will be called by the observables the instance registered with when they need to notify any changes.

memberdef.argsstring: (Handle< Quote > x0, Handle< YieldTermStructure > dividendTS, Handle< YieldTermStructure > riskFreeTS, Handle< BlackVolTermStructure > blackVolTS, const ext::shared_ptr< discretization > &d=ext::shared_ptr< discretization >(new EulerDiscretization), bool forceDiscretization=false)
memberdef.name: GeneralizedBlackScholesProcess

memberdef.argsstring: (Handle< Quote > x0, Handle< YieldTermStructure > dividendTS, Handle< YieldTermStructure > riskFreeTS, Handle< BlackVolTermStructure > blackVolTS, Handle< LocalVolTermStructure > localVolTS)
memberdef.name: GeneralizedBlackScholesProcess

detaileddescription.para: This class describes the stochastic process $ S $ governed by \[ d\ln S(t) = (r(t) - q(t) - \frac{\sigma(t, S)^2}{2}) dt + \sigma dW_t. \]

simplesect.para: while the interface is expressed in terms of $ S $, the internal calculations work on $ ln S $.
